verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2317>Hadrach<s%>, and <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> shall be its <S%H4496>resting-place<s%> (for the <S%H5869>eye<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> and of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is toward <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>);
and <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, <S%H1379>also<s%>, which bordereth <S%H6865>thereon<s%>; Tyre and <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>, because they are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2449>wise<s%>.

And <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> did <S%H1129>build<s%> herself a <S%H4692>stronghold<s%>, and heaped <S%H6651>up<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and fine <S%H2742>gold<s%> as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%>.

Behold <S%H136><s%>, the Lord will <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> <S%H5221>her<s%>, and he will smite her <S%H2428>power<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and she shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3372>it<s%>, and fear; <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> <S%H3966>also<s%>, and shall be sore <S%H2342>pained<s%>; and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>, for her <S%H4007>expectation<s%> shall be put to <S%H3001>shame<s%>; and the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> shall not be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>.
And a <S%H4464>bastard<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>, and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and his <S%H8251>abominations<s%> from between his <S%H8127>teeth<s%>; and he also shall be a <S%H7604>remnant<s%> for our <S%H430>God<s%>; and he shall be as a <S%H441>chieftain<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> as a <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>.

And I will <S%H2583>encamp<s%> about my <S%H1004>house<s%> against the <S%H4675>army<s%>, that none pass <S%H5674>through<s%> or <S%H7725>return<s%>; and no <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> them any <S%H7200>more<s%>: for now have I seen with mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; <S%H7321>shout<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%H4428>behold<s%>, thy king <S%H935>cometh<s%> unto <S%H6662>thee<s%>; he is just, and having <S%H3467>salvation<s%>; <S%H6041>lowly<s%>, and <S%H7392>riding<s%> upon an <S%H2543>ass<s%>, even upon a <S%H5895>colt<s%> the <S%H1121>foal<s%> of an <S%H860>ass<s%>.

And I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> from <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and the <S%H5483>horse<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>; and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: and his <S%H4915>dominion<s%> shall be from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and from the <S%H5104>River<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
As for thee <S%H1818>also<s%>, because of the blood of thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%> I have set <S%H7971>free<s%> thy <S%H615>prisoners<s%> from the <S%H953>pit<s%> wherein is no <S%H4325>water<s%>.

Turn <S%H7725><s%> you to the <S%H1225>stronghold<s%>, ye <S%H615>prisoners<s%> of <S%H8615>hope<s%>: even <S%H3117>to-day<s%> do I <S%H5046>declare<s%> that I will <S%H7725>render<s%> double unto <S%H4932>thee<s%>.

For I have <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> for <S%H4390>me<s%>, I have filled the <S%H7198>bow<s%> with <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; and I will stir <S%H5782>up<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, O <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, against thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, O <S%H3120>Greece<s%>, and will <S%H7760>make<s%> thee as the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> over <S%H2671>them<s%>; and his arrow shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> as the <S%H1300>lightning<s%>; and the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, and will <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H5591>whirlwinds<s%> of the <S%H8486>south<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will <S%H1598>defend<s%> <S%H398>them<s%>; and they shall devour, and shall tread <S%H3533>down<s%> the <S%H7050>sling<s%> - <S%H68>stones<s%>; and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and make a <S%H1993>noise<s%> as through <S%H3196>wine<s%>; and they shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> like <S%H4219>bowls<s%>, like the <S%H2106>corners<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> them in that <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>; for they shall be as the <S%H68>stones<s%> of a <S%H5145>crown<s%>, lifted on <S%H5264>high<s%> over his <S%H127>land<s%>.

For how great is his <S%H2898>goodness<s%>, and how great is his <S%H3308>beauty<s%>! <S%H1715>grain<s%> shall make the young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5107>flourish<s%>, and new <S%H8492>wine<s%> the <S%H1330>virgins<s%>.
